jcr:content.jcr:description: By protecting collagen, Definisse [KP1]® has been clinically proven to increase collagen density in the structural fibres of human skin.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Definisse [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide

title_copy_copy_copy.jcr:title: Beautify time. Protect and enhance your skin with our game changing Definisse [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide

text.text:
You can't stop time but you can slow it down and make it beautiful.

We rely on collagen for so much of our skin’s health and appearance, it is a vital component of youthful, supple skin.

 

Environmental factors such as free radicals and our own biology (certain enzymes) deplete the collagen we naturally produce. Moreover, as we age the skin's ability to produce collagen naturally decreases every year by 1.0-1.5%.  

 

 

Many treatments focus on stimulating collagen production - but now you can also protect and maintain the collagen that’s already present. 

 

Introducing the revolutionary Definisse  [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide. Formulated with the exclusive Key Peptide 1  [KP1]®  this skin care range is redefining topical anti-ageing by preventing collagen degradation. 

 

Combining Key Peptide 1  [KP1]®  with high and low molecular hyaluronic acid and other specific ingredients, it delivers improved skin density, firmness, brightness and reduces wrinkles.

item_1723188422005.cq:panelTitle: What is Definisse [KP1]® - Key Peptide 1 - Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide?

text_copy_copy.text:
Definisse [KP1]® Key Peptide 1 is a collagen modulator is a bio-active agent that works to inhibit the functioning of the enzymes responsible for depleting collagen.

It helps to increase your collagen levels by protecting what you naturally produce and may even stimulate production when used in conjunction with minimally invasive aesthetic treatments.

item_1723188426365.cq:panelTitle: What is Definisse [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide good for?

text_copy_copy.text:
By protecting collagen, Definisse  [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide has been clinically proven to increase Collagen Type 1 density in the structural fibres of human skin.12

The Definisse  [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide range of creams and serum can reduce all the signs of ageing associated with collagen depletion. 

Clinically proven to reduce wrinkles and fine lines, smooth and brighten skin, increase skin density and firmness.

item_1723188294817.cq:panelTitle: What is Definisse [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide treatment like?

text_copy_copy.text:
Definisse  [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide is an at-home skincare range of luxurious products that are simply massaged into your skin as part of your daily routine.

Apply a few drops to clean skin in the morning and evening by massaging until completely absorbed. Can be used in combination with aesthetic medicine treatments such as fillers and threads to improve results.

item_1723188303459.cq:panelTitle: How does Definisse [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide work?

text_copy_copy.text:
This first in class innovation, Definisse  [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide, is a skin care range that contains both high and low molecular weight Hyaluronic Acid (HA) and the exclusive key peptide 1 bio-active peptide derived from the Serine Protease Inhibitor Serpin A1. It is the Serpin A1 peptide that inhibits the degradation of collagen.13

Our skin care line also contains skin stimulating vitamins, antioxidants and moisturisers, therefore, not only protecting collagen, but increasing hydration and skin regeneration in one amazing luxurious and pleasurable skin care treatment. 

And if all of this sounds too good to be true - Definisse  [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide has been clinically proven to decrease wrinkles by 10% and increase hydration by 30% in just 4 weeks.13

text.text:
Take control of your skin with this unique and exclusive collagen preservation skincare programme. 

Clinically proven , in collaboration with the University of Florence, as effective in achieving significant improvement on five anti-aging parameters after only 4 weeks of use: hydration, elasticity, density, roughness, and brightness. 

This is made possible by the bio-active functions of the product -  proven to increase of the skin density values through an increase or a reorganisation of the dermal structures: collagen fibres, cells and extracellular matrix.16

Unprecedented results from an unprecedented innovation.

text_1553609734.text:
Clinically proven effective in addressing dullness and reducing fine lines and wrinkles.

The highly concentrated, fast-absorbing formula provides immediate and long lasting hydration, promoting a luminous, nourished, and velvety smooth skin.

text_300566569_copy.text: White Truffle Extract (fragrance less), that increases skin elasticity and performs  a filling effect

text_300566569.text: 2 next-generation HAs, that increase hydration and promote new collagen  substrate production

text_300566569_copy_.text: High molecular weight HA sits on the surface of the skin to prevent dehydration

text_300566569_copy_1154023159.text: Very low molecular weight HA can penetrate deep into the skin to significantly  improve hydration

text_300566569_copy_2134297842.text: Vitamin B5 - stimulates the physiological skin regeneration

text_1553609734.text:
Clinically proven effective in achieving significant improvement on five anti-aging parameters after only 4 weeks of use: hydration, elasticity, density, roughness, and brightness.

The lightweight, easy-to-absorb formula provides immediate and long-lasting hydration, leaving the skin nourished, firm, and velvety smooth.

text_671291012_copy__862585595.text: Phytosphingosine, that helps to maintain the skin barrier function

text_671291012_copy__845345114.text: Creatine for cosmetic use, that increases cellular energy

text_671291012_copy__1250021057.text: 2 next-generation HAs, that increase hydration and promote new collagen     substrate production

text_671291012_copy__1618457799.text: High molecular weight HA sits on the surface of the skin to prevent dehydration

text_671291012_copy__1402253923.text: Very low molecular weight HA can penetrate deeper into the skin significantly improving hydration

text_671291012_copy__125187829.text: Vitamin B5, stimulates the physiological skin regeneration

text_671291012_copy__787651797.text: Lactil®, a blend of humectants in aqueous solution acting as a substitute of the “Natural Moisturizing Factor” (NMF) of human skin

text_1553609734.text:
A complete cosmetic treatment for the eye area that reduces wrinkles, dark circles, and under-eye puffiness due to an effective combination of 3 peptides and 3 latest-generation hyaluronic acids.

Lightweight and easy-to-absorb formula that provides immediate and long-lasting hydration for fresh looking skin around the eyes.

text_671291012_copy_.text: Argireline®, a synthetic peptide, that helps inhibit the repetitive contraction  of facial expression muscles, thereby reducing hyperkinetic facial lines

text_671291012_copy__677889733.text: Acetil-tetrapeptide-5 proven effectiveness in reducing dark circles and  under eye puffiness

text_671291012_copy__736631964.text: 3 different types of HA promote new collagen substrate production:

text_671291012_copy__453474775.text: High molecular weight HA sits on the surface of the skin to prevent dehydration

text_671291012_copy__2108804644.text: Very low molecular weight HA can penetrate deeper into the skin significantly improving hydration

text_671291012_copy__1623671234.text: Cross-linked HA, has a significantly higher ability to hydrate the skin than other HAs, and double the ability to reduce wrinkles and wrinkle depth

text_671291012_copy__1720257049.text: Vitamin B5, stimulates the physiological skin regeneration

text_copy_copy.text: Creatine is a naturally occurring organic compound that works with the body on a cellular level.  It can increase cellular energy & therefore support repair, integrity and quality of the skin. Creatine is one of the active ingredients in Definisse [KP1]® redensifying cream.

A collagen modulator regulates and maintains the levels of collagen in the skin. This is made possible by an active ingredient that inhibits the enzymes responsible for degradation of collagen. Definisse  [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide uses the exclusive Serpin A1 peptide to protect the skin’s collagen levels.13

item_1723188294817.cq:panelTitle: How can I prevent loss of collagen in my skin?

text_copy_copy.text: As we age the skin’s ability to replenish collagen naturally decreases by 1.0 % – 1.5 % per year. This is compounded by environmental and biological factors that can cause degradation of collagen. Definisse  [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide skin care range contains the exclusive active ingredient Serpin A1 peptide which inhibits the enzymes in our skin responsible for breaking down our existing collagen, therefore maintaining collagen levels.

title_copy_1868237641.jcr:title: Definisse [KP1]® Collagen Modulator Bio-Peptide can be combined with other Definisse™ treatments, to achieve the best possible results in holistic pre-juvenation and rejuvenation, for optimal wellbeing.

text.text:
A revolutionary new product combined with a tried & tested favourite brings us an unprecedented treatment - Definisse™ Stimulate & Protect.

Simultaneously enhancing the skin’s ability to both regenerate and prevent erosion of it’s own collagen, this is dual action advanced anti-aging protocol.

 

Definisse™ Revitalise Threads mechanically promote collagen creation and the resulting increased firmness.  Definisse™ [KP1]® magnifies the collagen production effect and most significantly protects collagen from degradation by counteracting the enzymes that cause it’s breakdown. This treatment helps to both preserve and increase the level of collagen in the skin.

12. Pascarella S. et al. 2016. Serpin A1 C-terminal peptides as collagen turnover modulators. Chem Med Chem. 11:1850-1855

13. Cipriani C. et al. 2018. Serpin A1 and the modulation of type I collagen turnover: Effect of the C-terminal peptide 409–418 (SA1-III) in human dermal fibroblasts. Cell. Biol. Int. 9999:1-9.

16. Definisse [KP1]® Regenerating Serum. 2022. Instrumental and Subjective Evaluation of the Anti-age Efficacy of a Cosmetic Product. Institute of Skin and Product Evaluation (ISPE s.r.l.). Milan
